channel.title: Multiple E-mail adds?
channel.description:
well i am trying to use graboid to download movies, so everytime i need to make an account i need to get a new e-mail, is there any way of having one orginal e-mail then having multiple mirror e-mails. ex: i would have let say seto@hotmail.com and i would be able to make e-mail such as 455@whatever.com,456@whatever.com, if any mail is sent to these add it should come to seto@hotmail.com.
thanks in advance

item.title: Multiple E-mail adds?
item.dc:creator: @solemage2 solemage2
item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

graboid is the same as ORBIT. I have tried Graboid but i find ORBIT easier to use. You can even download from megavideo and so on.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple E-mail adds?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

[quote=“solemage2, post:3, topic:322396”]What kind of movies? streamed or torrents?
I suggest Downloading ORBIT, it can download any streamed content, Music, video, and so on.[/quote]
all kinds of movies (english tho), but graboid lets your download tv eps and documentary

i like it cause its not like torrent, it basically downloads file at max speed of my internet.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple E-mail adds?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

You can use http://10minutemail.com/ and get as many as you want fast and easy.

item.description:
@solemage2 wrote:

What kind of movies? streamed or torrents?
I suggest Downloading ORBIT, it can download any streamed content, Music, video, and so on.

item.title: Multiple E-mail adds?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

why don’t you just use gmail and then use tag addresses?

if you signup for gmail with say seto@gmail.com, you can then use seto+whatever, seto+titfuck, seto+joebloggs etc and they will all go to that address

or would that be too obvious to the admins of whatever site you are cheating?

Read full topic
